trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Kirkland
There were no other sightings in Kirkland on or around May 22nd 2009
Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
divs: sighting detailsi was sitting on my back porch with my wife and her cousin around 10 pm. i noticed what appeared to be a bright satellite (moving at a similiar speed to a satellite from south to north). i said wow, that cant be one, its too bright, maybe its the space station or the space shuttle. then the light dimmed as i said that and disappeared entirely. from the beginning to end the diameter was as large as vega in the beginning and as small as a pin prick when it vanished. 15 minutes later i was in my backyard with a friend, and as i remembered the sighting. i told him emphatically how weird it was to see something so bright and know it was not a plane. at that moment, he said "like that?" i turned around (facing west towards lake washington) and a very bright oval\sphere object about the size of a dime in the sky moved from behind and a above a row of trees about 100 to 125 yards from our position. he then said "thats not a plane" i agreed and proceeded to become nervous because i had the feeling that it knew we knew about it and once i said something it had appeared. it stayed in plain sight above the tree line at 500 to 1500 feet up. i have lots of aircraft fly over from large airliners to small float planes and traffic cessna's so determining the height was very easy. it moved west to east in a slow up and down undulating motion that almost seemed to be playing with my line of sight as i ran to the corner of my yard to keep it in sight. as i took up another clear view it suddenly dimmed itself out into an ever smaller ring that went from the brightest white light i have ever seen to an orangish brown ring the size of what i can only describe as a needle point. i took a very poor cell phone video of the sighting, but it is like i said poor. i have never seen something so big , so low and so quiet. i have a witness , and he will attest to this as well.
Summary: UFO makes low fly 2nd appearance after first sighting.
